TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class CompileWorkflowCleanupTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompileWorkflowCleanupTask extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines an MSBuild task for erasing the contents of temporary files that are used when compiling workflows created using Visual Basic. The contents of the temporary files are erased but the files are not deleted. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This class extends the `Task` class of Microsoft Build framework. The class should be used when compiling Windows Workflow Foundation types of Visual Basic projects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Erases the contents of the files specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowCleanupTask.TemporaryFiles%2A> property, without deleting the files.
Docs.returns: if the task successfully executed; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an array of paths to temporary files created when compiling workflows created using Visual Basic .NET.
Docs.value: A list of temporary files associated with this compilation task.
